testcase.classname: Amazon bedding Iteam selection and check out testing
testcase.name: Validate Amazon Home page
testcase.system-out: Given user opens Browser....................................................passed Then user on Home page......................................................passed Then user click on Manubar-All..............................................passed Then user click on Shop of Department see All...............................passed Then user click on Home and kitchen.........................................passed Then user click on Bedding..................................................passed Then user on bedding Page...................................................passed Then user click on Feacture brands SafeRest and Ultopia Bedding.............passed When title of page change according to brands...............................passed Then user check the rating of the product and click on it...................passed Then user on a Product page.................................................passed When title on a page chnage according to Product............................passed Then user check the Ratings.................................................passed Then user click on Add To Cart..............................................passed When check if iteam is alredy in cart.......................................passed Then click on process to checkout...........................................passed Then user is on Sign IN page................................................passed When title of the page change to Sign In....................................passed Then user click on create your amazon account...............................passed Then user Enter all the details and click on create account.................passed
